com.konakart.appif

Interface PdfOptionsIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PdfOptions

    public interface PdfOptionsIf
    Options when producing a PDF document.

      • setType

        void setType(int type)
        Request type

        "HTML types" can be one of:

        • KKConstants.HTML_ORDER_DETAIL (= 1)
        • KKConstants.HTML_ORDER_INVOICE (= 2)
        • KKConstants.HTML_ORDER_PACKING_LIST (= 3)
        • KKConstants.HTML_NAMED_TEMPLATE (= 9)
        Parameters:
        type -
